title: Easy to customize to organizations needs
name: Jade S.
pros: Pros: Ticketfly has been our ticketing platform for 3+ years and we love it. Easy to customize to fit our needs and easy for the consumer to use. Support team is amazing as well and really goes above and beyond to help with whatever you need.
cons: Cons: They were recently acquired by Eventbrite so I think we'll eventually have to transition to their platform, which I think is way lower quality.
overall: Overall: Amazing ticketing platform that is easy to use and makes us look really professional.

title: Best ticketing system for small clubs & venues!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Ticketfly is SUPER user friendly, and a common household name for purchasing tickets. It's a trusted site, easy to navigate, and makes it easy to sell tickets to events to customers.
cons: Cons: In the back end, a user can't set anyone up for auto counts. Not a big deal, but I always have to contact an admin to get people set up for counts.
overall: Overall: Overall, I would recommend ticketfly to any up and coming music club!

title: My favorite ticketing company. Too bad it's going away
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Super easy backend interface. I was never confused when working events where we sold tickets through Ticketfly! Audit reports and will call lists always easy to find, names never listed confusingly. All around solid.
cons: Cons: That it got bought out by Eventbrite and is slowly transitioning all of its accounts onto that platform, which is more mobile-friendly but generally inferior in a lot of ways.

title: I've used this for purchasing concert tickets
name: Ernie Z.
pros: Pros: I like the fact that it's super easy to use for purchasing tickets and it's pretty cool how they show a lot of other events/concerts going on so you can possibly check out more bands you like that are playing.
cons: Cons: The service fees are annoying. I almost wish the ticket prices that are shown would just include any service fees and that sort of thing instead of getting me excited for the cost and then all of a sudden it bumps up with the extra costs.

title: Ticketfly is pretty fly
name: Chris H.
pros: Pros: Quick and easy to search and purchase tickets
cons: Cons: Services fees are absolutely ridiculous and greatly increase the cost of tickets.
overall: Overall: I've only used ticketfly a couple times but it worked well and I got my tickets and was admitted to the show without any issues. Much like other ticket vendors it all goes sour when you purchase multiple tickets and then get hit with the service fees at the end. Paying service fees for an electronic ticket is absolute bull crap and shouldn't be allowed. Much like Ticketmaster, Ticketfly uses these fees to pad their bottom line and generate revenue. I always suggest purchasing tickets from the venue box office but if you must...ticketfly is as good as the rest at getting you tickets from the convenience of your pc.

title: Solid alternative to Ticketmaster
name: Paolo C.
pros: Pros: Seems to be less clunky than Ticketmaster and the fees aren't exorbitant. Pretty easy to use and I always like the option of getting hard tickets . Never had to wait in a "virtual waiting room" for any events thru this site., which is nice.
cons: Cons: I've seen some shows that only sell digital tickets, which I don't always prefer. Also I tried transferring tickets to a friend once and their support said I couldn't for some reason....wasn't really clear as to why.
overall: Overall: Overall pretty good. Don't usually expect much from ticketing software companies as they seem to all be very similar as far as how they work and their fees.

title: Completely unsuccessful, from product performance through customer service.
name: Richard V.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Seems to be less clunky than Ticketmaster and the fees aren't exorbitant. Pretty easy to use and I always like the option of getting hard tickets . Never had to wait in a "virtual waiting room" for any events thru this site., which is nice.
cons:
Cons:

I attempted to use Ticketfly to purchase tickets to an Austin City Limits Moody Theatre event in Austin, Texas.
overall: Overall: None. Ticketfly was a complete and utter waste of user time. Yield to this consumer was negative.

title: I go to a lot of concerts and use Ticketfly to search for tickets
name: Tracy C.
pros: Pros: I like the ease of searching for tickets for specific bands/performers and specific towns or cities. The ticket choice menus are simple and easy to understand. Comes in handy when you are looking for that band that you've been waiting to see for ages!
cons: Cons: I guess there is no real negative to Ticketfly. I am just not a fan of reselling tickets in general, but understand that other than obvious scalpers (and there are many out there), things happen, and you may need to sell your ticket to a show for some reason.
overall: Overall: None. Ticketfly was a complete and utter waste of user time. Yield to this consumer was negative.

title: 100% Would Recommend
name: Christie C.
pros: Pros: After using many similar services Ticketfly is the absolute best way to sell tickets online. Customer service is amazing. Ticket fees are reasonable.
cons: Cons: No complaints. It's a fantastic product.
overall: Overall: None. Ticketfly was a complete and utter waste of user time. Yield to this consumer was negative.

title: Pricey but worth it
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I used many ticket softwares but this one is wonderful. It integrates easily with my social media pages, it's easy for my crowd to navigate and gathering sales info is wonderful. I love the how easy the code is to incorporate in my website and the IOS app ticket scan is a life saver. Now that it's combined with eventbrite I've grown my audience significantly
cons: Cons: I can't think of any cons at the moment but it's website could like a little cooler.
overall: Overall: None. Ticketfly was a complete and utter waste of user time. Yield to this consumer was negative.

title: Great, convenient software for buying tickets
name: Alex A.
pros: Pros: Ticketfly makes it super simple to buy tickets for events. It is one of my favorite softwares for getting tickets to events.
cons: Cons: There are not many cons here. It'd always be nice if there weren't additional fees on tickets but everyone does that. q
overall: Overall: Overall a very positive experience!

title: this product has been great for our events
name: Jami C.
pros: Pros: I love the ease in setting up an event. You don't have to be super tech savvy to use. Highly recommend.
cons: Cons: This product does seem a little pricey. I also had a hard time setting up a free event. So doesn't fit for all needs.
overall: Overall: Overall a very positive experience!

title: What a breath of fresh air
name: Henry D.
comments:
Comments: I've used their service to purchase tickets and was always surprised that a service a slick as this was offered with such reasonable fees. On top of that, whenever I had an issue, their customer support folks were beyond helpful.

When I finally needed a ticketing service for events that I throw, they were first on my list and they have not disappointed. Quick response time to inquiry. Willing to negotiate fees. A TON of tools (although I don't know how much f them I'll actually need....a lot seemed geared towards venues).
pros: Pros: I love the ease in setting up an event. You don't have to be super tech savvy to use. Highly recommend.
cons: Cons: This product does seem a little pricey. I also had a hard time setting up a free event. So doesn't fit for all needs.
overall: Overall: Overall a very positive experience!

title: Hard to make it through. Prices confusing
name: Conrad W.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
comments:
Comments: I've used their service to purchase tickets and was always surprised that a service a slick as this was offered with such reasonable fees. On top of that, whenever I had an issue, their customer support folks were beyond helpful.

When I finally needed a ticketing service for events that I throw, they were first on my list and they have not disappointed. Quick response time to inquiry. Willing to negotiate fees. A TON of tools (although I don't know how much f them I'll actually need....a lot seemed geared towards venues).
pros: Pros: I love purchasing things on the go. I want my tickets and I want to know my seats. This makes it a possibility.
cons: Cons: What I like least was it didn't seem to be very intuitive nor was there a real forum to answer my questions. The last G.A. Tickets I purchased showed a price range yet no reason for the price difference. They also did not indicate when they would ship and I had a hard time getting those questions answered
overall: Overall: Overall a very positive experience!

title: Ticketfly Review
name: Verified Reviewer
comments:
Comments: I've used their service to purchase tickets and was always surprised that a service a slick as this was offered with such reasonable fees. On top of that, whenever I had an issue, their customer support folks were beyond helpful.

When I finally needed a ticketing service for events that I throw, they were first on my list and they have not disappointed. Quick response time to inquiry. Willing to negotiate fees. A TON of tools (although I don't know how much f them I'll actually need....a lot seemed geared towards venues).
pros: Pros: Very easy to navigate, fees are low and are clearly laid out, multiple types of ticket delivery options.
cons: Cons: No sporting events, limited selection of events due to lack of mainstream artists.
overall: Overall: Solid website if you are looking to see smaller musical acts, and not spend a ton of money to see live music.

title: Quick and easy service. Reliable website - trusted payment method. I use this often to purchase tix
name: Kylie A.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
comments:
Comments: I've used their service to purchase tickets and was always surprised that a service a slick as this was offered with such reasonable fees. On top of that, whenever I had an issue, their customer support folks were beyond helpful.

When I finally needed a ticketing service for events that I throw, they were first on my list and they have not disappointed. Quick response time to inquiry. Willing to negotiate fees. A TON of tools (although I don't know how much f them I'll actually need....a lot seemed geared towards venues).
pros: Pros: I like the ease of use and the wide availability of tickets. I also trust that my payment information will not be compromised.
cons: Cons: I believe there is a significant upcharge in the price of tickets. Also, service fee is high and could be purchased elsewhere.
overall: Overall: Solid website if you are looking to see smaller musical acts, and not spend a ton of money to see live music.

title: Unresponsive, not-secure, people not receiving their tickets, rampant fraud
name: Paul T.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
comments:
Comments: I've used their service to purchase tickets and was always surprised that a service a slick as this was offered with such reasonable fees. On top of that, whenever I had an issue, their customer support folks were beyond helpful.

When I finally needed a ticketing service for events that I throw, they were first on my list and they have not disappointed. Quick response time to inquiry. Willing to negotiate fees. A TON of tools (although I don't know how much f them I'll actually need....a lot seemed geared towards venues).
pros: Pros: They have a pretty website, making it easy to give them your money. They have horrible customer support, so good luck talking to them when theres a problem... and it seems there are always problems.
cons: Cons: No customer support, rampant fraudulent purchases, customers don't receive their tickets, security breaches releasing personal information via regular hacks...
overall: Overall: I have yet to hear back from their "Customer Service" I believe this entire company is a scam.

title: Ticketfly review
name: Paul B.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
comments:
Comments: I've used their service to purchase tickets and was always surprised that a service a slick as this was offered with such reasonable fees. On top of that, whenever I had an issue, their customer support folks were beyond helpful.

When I finally needed a ticketing service for events that I throw, they were first on my list and they have not disappointed. Quick response time to inquiry. Willing to negotiate fees. A TON of tools (although I don't know how much f them I'll actually need....a lot seemed geared towards venues).
pros: Pros: The software was great everything works great and easy to use. Well written code with no bugs. I love the software but didn't enjoy the show tonight at the Revolution Hall in Portland Oregon.
cons: Cons: No customer support, rampant fraudulent purchases, customers don't receive their tickets, security breaches releasing personal information via regular hacks...
overall: Overall: I have yet to hear back from their "Customer Service" I believe this entire company is a scam.
